title: 9/18/17 -  'New Perspective' @ The Blaze.com
description:
The time for reform is right now ..."Peaceful protests!" "Peaceful protests!" "Peaceful protests!" ...Reporter attacked and assaulted by Black Lives Matter ...Lawrence Jones of TheBlaze says the St. Louis riots are just 'leftist agitators'... .Racist decor at Hobby Lobby...cotton? ...Tobacco, rum, rice = racist ...No slaves were involved in the making of 'Sweet ‘N' Low' ...Perspective over opinion, NEW at TheBlaze.com...stories that matter the most ...Blind Democrats leading the blind Democrats ...Glenn's return from Nantucket...Meets with the president of Rwanda...Tutsi and Hutu? 

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
